### Making Websites

RStudio can be used for building websites by combining capabilites of RMarkdown and Github. 

1. Fork and clone existing webpage github repo to start
1. Edit and add text, images, code, etc. and format in RMarkdown files, with one file per page
1. Knit RMarkdown files to preview the pages
1. Update the .yml file if you want to change the appearance/style, or change the website layout (e.g. number or names of pages)
1. Build website via "Build"" tab in RStudio or with command rmarkdown::render_site()
1. Commit and push changes to GitHub repository
